snippet: Nine-times champion Rafael Nadal sent shockwaves around Roland Garros on Friday when he unexpectedly pulled out of the French Open because of an injury to his left wrist....
lead_paragraph: Nine-times champion Rafael Nadal sent shockwaves around Roland Garros on Friday when he unexpectedly pulled out of the French Open because of an injury to his left wrist.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Pulls Out of French Open With Wrist Injury
headline.main: Nadal Pulls Out of French Open With Wrist Injury
